name: burn-up
effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Removes the user's fire type after damage calculation.  If the user is not fire-type, this move will fail.

flavor_text_entries.sun-moon:
To inflict massive damage, the user burns itself out.
After using this move, the user will no longer be
Fire type.
